Package main.data

Class Images

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.data.Images
  • public class Images
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for all the images used in the game

    • Method Detail

      • generateScaledImages

        public static void generateScaledImages​(float scaleX,
                                        float scaleY)
        Scaling method for all images that are scaled based on screen resolution
        Parameters:
        scaleX - horizontal scaling factor
        scaleY - vertical scaling factor

      • fillArrayListWithScaledImages

        private static void fillArrayListWithScaledImages​(float scaleX,
                                                  float scaleY,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> paths,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.Image> destination)
        Method responsible for adding scaled images to the final arraylist of images
        Parameters:
        scaleX - horizontal scaling factor
        scaleY - vertical scaling factor
        paths - image file path
        destination - arraylist that the image needs to be added to

      • getScaledImage

        private static javafx.scene.image.Image getScaledImage​(float scaleX,
                                                       float scaleY,
                                                       javafx.scene.image.Image original)
        Method for actually scaling individual images
        Parameters:
        scaleX - horizontal scaling factor
        scaleY - vertical scaling factor
        original - original image
        Returns:
        new scaled image

      • getImageFromList

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image getImageFromList​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.Image> list,
                                                        byte index,
                                                        boolean dir)
        Accessor method for returning an image from a list
        Parameters:
        list - the list you want to get an image from
        index - the index of the image (not taking into account whether it is a right or left image)
        dir - whether it is a right (true) image or left (false) image
        Returns:
        the Image you were looking for
